author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Jeer from Tirukurungudi arrived in Srirangam on Monday and offered worship to the presiding deity and Sri Ranganayaki at Sri Ranganathaswamy temple.

The acharya was received with temple honours at Ranga Ranga gopuram.

The swami visited the shrines of Sri Manavala Mamunigal, Sri Nammazhwar, Sri Koorathazhwar, and Sri Ramanujar.

He called on Sri Ranga Narayana Jeer of Srirangam.

Earlier, the Jeer was received by P. Jayaraman, Joint Commissioner of Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowment and Executive Officer of the temple, and Kasturi and Srinivasan Members of the Board of Trustees.
title: Tirukurungudi Jeer visits Srirangam
